description.lang: Inovelli's Smart Plug-In On/Off Module + Repeater has the ability to turn on and off appliances, lights, and more from anywhere in the world. In addition to the outlet, the smart plug acts as a Z-Wave signal repeater, which amplifies your Z-Wave signal, growing the capabilities of your network. This smart plug is one of the smallest plugs on the market (3.5"x2.5"x1.5") and has 1 Z-Wave Outlet on the side of the deviceand an "Always On" (non-smart outlet) on the other side, allowing for easy fit in compact places. Simplifying lives, one smart home product at a time... that's Inovelli.
The association group supports five nodes and lifeline function
